ProjectTitle: Balanced trade secret protection ? Search for a balance with the freedom to conduct a business
InitialFeedbackHistory: 05/04/2023 [REDACTED] do the data you (re)use contain personal data? [REDACTED] so please register this via a PRET application, for more information see: https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/studpers/index, if you are not sure please contact pret@kuleuven.be [REDACTED] databases often have conditions for the use of the data, they normally allow use for research but sharing my be restricted, check with the databases what the conditions are, please contact rdm@kuleuven.be if you like to review this with an RDM advisor [REDACTED] [REDACTED] you use a reference manager such as zotero or annotation software like nvivo? [REDACTED] databases may als contain metadata that you may use. [REDACTED] more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata [REDACTED] Please note that the data sharing section concerns the data underlying publications, not the publications themselves, lirias is not suitable for data sharing, but KU [REDACTED] also has a data repository RDR that you can use for this purpose: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
